googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mary Kate Inabinet
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Extremely pleased with our experience!  We needed a cartridge replaced in our bathtub faucet, but we couldn't get the old cartridge out.  Brittany was kind and helpful on the phone and was able to send someone out very quickly.  Bryan was so polite and friendly and efficient!  He did a fantastic job explaining why it was stuck, what he was doing, and the potential issues they could run into.  They prepared me for the worst but delivered the best!  Completed the whole project, including travel time to get the replacement part, in an hour and a half.  Would definitely recommend Hobbs!!

googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Joyce Forehand
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I called Hobbs Plumbing spoke with a nice lady named Brittany she scheduled me for the same day I called. A very pleasant and knowledgeable young man named Bryan came out assessed our situation. We had a loud noise in our water pipes, I called it  the “dinosaur”. Our house is 30 years old.  He checked our water pressure it was high.  I suspected it was our PRV and it was.  Bryan relocated our PRV near our water meter instead of at our house in the crawl space. I’m very pleased with the service we received. I will definitely  will use Hobbs Plumbing when needed again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Brittany and Bryan do a great job taking care of our clients. Thank you so much for your feedback.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Linda Givins
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I would like to thank the customer service of Hobbs Plumbing. I had no hot water and the prospects of getting it fixed was a week or longer. I talked with Brittney and she said if she could get someone out earlier she would call me back. Brittney called back and said a technician had finished a job early and would send him out. Bryan arrived and fixed the problem and some others he found. Thank you Bryan for being so helpful and courteous. Would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing if you have a plumbing issue.
J. Givins
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: We are happy that we could help! Thank you for the feedback. We always love hearing great things about our people. B. Hobbs

googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: "I would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing LLC, to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika/Lee County area. googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: VANESSA ECHOLS
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I would give Hobbs Plumbing one million stars if I could.  Yes, one million! We had an issue at my elderly parents' home.  Setting up the appointment was very easy, thanks to Brittany, who was so pleasant, helpful and efficient.  Brian arrived at their home and the pleasant experience continued.  He was also so nice and professional and got the job done! Trying to find the right plumber to get the job done correctly can be stressful.  Hobbs Plumbing got the job done, with no stress for me.  I'm grateful.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Anthony Kennedy
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I live in Tuskegee. I could not find a plumber in the area, so I looked in Auburn and found Hobbs. The charges were to begin when they left Auburn which I had no problems with. I had a kitchen sink removed and installed and I had a faucet installed outside from a closed off water line. I had previously purchased the sink, kitchen faucet, and all necessary supplies for sink, but I did not have an outside faucet. They were here for approximately 3.5 hours. The total cost was $650. Bryan and Wade were knowledgeable and courteous young men.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Caitlin Walp
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I will never have anyone else fix any plumbing related issues at my house ever again other Hobbs Plumbing. I have had to call them multiple times for different things going on in my older house and they have come and fixed everything extremely quickly. Blake has always been very sweet and patient explaining everything to me. He not only found a rare part for my shower due to old pipes but made sure to give me the part info should I ever need another, but his company also came out to my house two days after Christmas to fix a busted pipe as planned but they also fixed my sink as well that they were not told about during the call and showed no irritation with this. So many other times they have come out due to old pipes that they have always gone above and beyond for my family. Highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing for any and all plumbing needs, They are amazing!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ben Ray
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Best in town!! If I could give 10 stars I would!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Bridget Gipson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I own several rental properties in Auburn. I have been using Hobbs to do most of the work lately. There was an issue with a new bathroom faucet that was installed by Hobbs the week before, I paid $125. I noticed there was a problem with the new faucet handles being loose, they charged me another $125 to install another replacement. During the 2nd visit, the plumber left something black in the bottom of the bathtub, it looked like grease and dirt. When I cleaned it off, I saw a large chip at the bottom of the bathtub drain. This was not there before the plumber arrived. The plumber had lots of tools sitting on the side of the bathtub, which I believe fell and damaged the drain, but according the owner, the plumber claimed he didn't cause the damage. The drain damage was not there prior to the plumber arriving. The owner says that he believes the plumber and refuses to fix the drain damage without charging me additional money. I have no reason to lie about the drain damage. Clearly, customers are not that important to Hobbs. The owner was really rude, taking no responsibility for damage that was caused. Basically, the owner is saying I am lying. If there was damage to the drain, prior to the plumber coming, I would have gotten that fixed. It would not have cost me any more money because they charge $125 per hour and the plumber was on there 20 mins, replacing the faucet so why would I need to lie about damage to my drain. After this experience, I would not use this company again. The owner threatened to take me to collections, if I didn't pay the bill. I never said anything about not paying, but this is how rude and offensive he was to me. Horrible customer service and the lack of professionalism. The owner doesn't value his customers or doing what is right. He wasn't there, but clearly, he believes his plumber over a paying customer. He could have come out and corrected the problem at no charge, but he refused.  He was very offensive so I definitely wouldn't recommend this company, especially if they create other issues and problems while they are working at your home, they won't take responsibility and they will charge you to fix their mistakes.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brandon Miller
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We had a pipe burst on Christmas Day due to the deep freeze...I knew it was going to be hard to find a plumber and I called 5 different places - Hobbs was the only company that could come out the next day!  They send a young man named Bryan who found our busted pipe rather quickly, and then repaired it even quicker.  I could not be more pleased.  Two thumbs up, great experience and great customer service from this company.  Bryan is the man!  This is the only plumbing company I will use in the Auburn area for the foreseeable future!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Hobbs Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jordan Boulware
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I came home from vacation during spring break to a leak in my hot water heater... I called maybe 30 plumbers and none could get me in that day. Hobbs plumbing was working on a job near me and communicated with me all day and even arrived earlier than expected. He took a look at the problem and quoted me a very fair price and became replacing it right then. He even took the time to rip the wet carpet up and set up a fan for me. He also repaired a sink and a toilet I had been having trouble with. I would highly recommend this company for all your plumbing needs. He is great and is a stand up guy!

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

#### Alabama Business Registration/License Details
While the specific license details for Hobbs Plumbing LLC are not provided in the sources, it is required for any Alabama LLC to obtain a Business Privilege License from the county where the business is located. For Hobbs Plumbing LLC, this would be Lee County, given its location in Auburn, Alabama[1].

#### Physical Location and Service Areas
Hobbs Plumbing LLC is located at 4011 Somerset Ct, Auburn, AL 36832. The business serves the Auburn area and possibly other parts of Lee County[4].

#### Hours and Payment Methods
The hours of operation for Hobbs Plumbing LLC are not explicitly stated in the sources, but it is mentioned that the business is closed now and will open the next day at 8:00 a.m.[3]. Payment methods are not specified.

#### Years in Operation
The sources do not provide the exact year Hobbs Plumbing LLC was established in Alabama, but it is distinct from the Florida-based Hobbs Plumbing, Inc., which was established in 1973[2].

### Services & Specialties:

#### Types of Services Offered
Hobbs Plumbing LLC specializes in all plumbing repairs, services, and remodels. Specific services include:
- Plumbing repairs
- Plumbing services
- Remodels
- Maintenance contracts
- Sewer camera services
- Jetting
- Leak detection
- No dig sewer repairs[4].

#### Service Areas Covered
The business serves the Auburn area and surrounding parts of Lee County, Alabama[4].

#### Emergency Service Availability
There is no explicit mention of 24/7 emergency service for Hobbs Plumbing LLC in the provided sources, although this is a common service offered by many plumbing companies.

#### Prices or Rates
No specific prices or rates are mentioned in the sources[3][4].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

#### Review Summaries with Specific Examples
Hobbs Plumbing LLC has a 4.9-star rating based on 49 reviews. Customers praise the business for being on time, efficient, and providing excellent work. For example, one customer noted that Blake Hobbs and his brother completed a complex job involving installing washer/dryer combos in rental units that were not initially wired or plumbed for laundry equipment, and they did it in one day[3].

#### BBB Rating and Status
There is no information provided about the BBB rating or status for Hobbs Plumbing LLC in the sources.

#### Common Customer Feedback Themes
Customers frequently mention the timeliness, efficiency, and high quality of the work done by Hobbs Plumbing LLC. Customer satisfaction is highlighted as a key priority for the business[3][4].

#### Response to Reviews
There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews.

### Owner & Staff:

#### Owner/Management Information
The owner of Hobbs Plumbing LLC is Blake Hobbs. His brother is also involved in the business, as mentioned in customer reviews[3].

#### Staff Qualifications
There is no detailed information provided about the qualifications of the staff beyond the owner's involvement.

#### Professional Certifications
No specific professional certifications are mentioned for the staff of Hobbs Plumbing LLC in the sources. However, given the nature of the business, it is likely that the plumbers are certified and licensed to operate in Alabama.
aboutUs: With over 52 years of combined experience, Hobbs Plumbing LLC is Auburn's premier plumbing service provider. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in all aspects of plumbing repairs, services, and remodels, including maintenance contracts, sewer camera services, jetting, leak detection, and no-dig sewer repairs. Serving the Auburn area and surrounding Lee County, we take pride in our local expertise and commitment to delivering exceptional workmanship.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing partner dedicated to delivering efficient, high-quality solutions tailored to your needs.
sellingPoints: Prompt and reliable service from a team of highly trained and certified plumbing professionals.
Comprehensive range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance to complex remodels and specialized solutions like sewer camera inspections and no-dig sewer repairs.
Commitment to customer satisfaction, ensuring every job is completed with precision, attention to detail, and a focus on your long-term plumbing needs.
